name: Channel Player
summary:
Channel Player has two scenes.

Playback title selection screen at Spacecraft theater.
Display other titles with the left and right sticks and triggers. In the case of a folder or comic book (zip, cbz) where only still images are saved, they will be displayed in the same way as the folder where videos are saved. No need to sort the contents by name or by time, they will be listed in advance. It also has a favorite, history function, and unplayed title display function.
